column4: http://pastebin.com/ug6X4p0u wylde this is the page in the rescue cd that we are on
DOES anyone know if it will do damage to my disk or data to exit the ubuntu live cd at that page?
doubt it could damage anything as it hasn't even picked a root fs. what was it doing before that?
fyi there is an accessibility channel, if the problem was a11y related
wasn't following your problem, but if it is accessibility related there is/was an accessibility channel #ubuntu-accessibility (it might be empty)
the problem is the human interface but thank you so much IRC is a text medium - the one thing we both have is text/graphics so it works better than lots of things
won't open... meaning what? what kind of attachments?

we both have Yahoo mail, he mails the laptop (my account) in order to print from open office .doc(s), but my Yahoo mail can't open them, it just sits here trying and apparently times out, i don't know how to see an error in Yahoo mail.
so you click on the attachment in yahoo and say "download" and what happens
the twirly circle thing shows for a while and vanishes. the attachment doesn't open.
sounds like a problem with your browser/yahoo
i didn't change anything on my side.
its something that happened with him changing ubuntu or new firefox
not sure what to tell you, and we would need more details about exactly how your husband is attaching his files
he clicks on attach in firefox
firefox works. if there is a problem then its with yahoo. it could be yahoo interacting with his firefox or your browser... but its on the yahoo side

you could look at the email source and see if the attachment body is missing. perhaps yahoo is failing to attach the file he uploads to the email so there is a reference to the attachment but no contents.

the only other thing i can think of would be is if the files he creates with libreoffice are subtly different and cannot be opened by your version of word, but in that case the file would download first
